lib/btsp/btsp.c

00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Bottleneck traveling salesman problem (BTSP) methods.
00003  *
00004  * Heuristic for solving the bottleneck traveling salesman problem (BTSP).
00005  *
00006  * @author  John LaRusic
00007  * @ingroup lib
00008  ****************************************************************************/
00009 #include "common.h"
00010 #include "btsp.h"
00011 
00012 /****************************************************************************
00013  * Public function implementations
00014  ****************************************************************************/
00015 int 
00016 arrow_btsp_solve(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_problem_info *info,
00017                  arrow_btsp_params *params, arrow_btsp_result *result)
00018 {    
00019     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00020     int is_feasible;
00021     int i, low, high, median, median_val;
00022     double start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00023     
00024     arrow_btsp_result cur_result;
00025     arrow_btsp_result_init(problem, &cur_result);
00026     
00027     result->optimal = ARROW_FALSE;
00028     result->found_tour = ARROW_FALSE;
00029 
00030     /* Print out debug information */
00031     /*
00032     arrow_debug("Confirm solution?: %s\n", 
00033         params->confirm_sol == ARROW_TRUE ? "Yes" : "No");
00034     arrow_debug("Supress EBST?: %s\n", 
00035         params->supress_ebst == ARROW_TRUE ? "Yes" : "No");
00036     arrow_debug("Find short tour?: %s\n", 
00037         params->find_short_tour == ARROW_TRUE ? "Yes" : "No");
00038     arrow_debug("Initial Lower Bound: %d\n", params->lower_bound);
00039     arrow_debug("Initial Upper Bound: %d\n", params->upper_bound);  
00040     if(params->num_steps > 0)
00041     {
00042         arrow_debug("Total solve steps: %d\n", params->num_steps);
00043     }
00044     arrow_debug("\n");
00045     */
00046     
00047     /* Start enhanced threshold heuristic */
00048     arrow_debug("Starting enhanced threshold heuristic\n");
00049     arrow_debug("Current solution: %d\n", result->max_cost);
00050     ret = arrow_btsp_feasible(problem, params->num_steps, params->steps, INT_MIN, 
00051                               params->lower_bound, &is_feasible, result);
00052     if(ret != ARROW_SUCCESS)
00053     {
00054         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00055         goto CLEANUP;
00056     }
00057     if(is_feasible)
00058     {
00059         arrow_debug("A tour was found!.\n");
00060         result->optimal = ARROW_TRUE;
00061         result->found_tour = ARROW_TRUE;
00062         goto CONFIRM;
00063     }
00064     
00065     /* Start enhanced binary search threshold heuristic */
00066     if(params->supress_ebst) goto CONFIRM;
00067     arrow_debug("\nStarting enhanced binary search threshold heuristic.\n");
00068 
00069     ret = arrow_util_binary_search(info->cost_list, info->cost_list_length,
00070                                    params->lower_bound, &low);
00071     if(!ret)
00072     {
00073         low--;
00074         arrow_debug("Lower bound not in cost list, so pick next lowest\n");
00075         arrow_debug("Next lowest cost is %d...", info->cost_list[low]);
00076     }
00077     
00078     int upper_bound = params->upper_bound;
00079     if(result->max_cost < upper_bound) upper_bound = result->max_cost;
00080     if(upper_bound == INT_MAX)
00081     {
00082         arrow_debug("Taking largest cost as upperbound...\n");
00083         high = info->cost_list_length - 1;
00084     }
00085     else
00086     {
00087         ret = arrow_util_binary_search(info->cost_list, info->cost_list_length,
00088                                        upper_bound, &high);
00089     }
00090     
00091     arrow_debug("Starting binary search.\n");
00092     while(low != high)
00093     {
00094         median = ((high - low) / 2) + low;
00095         median_val = info->cost_list[median];
00096         arrow_debug("low = %d; high = %d; median = %d\n", 
00097                     info->cost_list[low], info->cost_list[high], median_val);
00098         
00099         ret = arrow_btsp_feasible(problem, params->num_steps, params->steps, 
00100                                   INT_MIN, median_val, &is_feasible, &cur_result);
00101         if(ret != ARROW_SUCCESS)
00102         {
00103             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00104             goto CLEANUP;
00105         }
00106         
00107         if(is_feasible)
00108         {
00109             arrow_debug("A tour was found!\n");
00110             result->found_tour = ARROW_TRUE;
00111             
00112             /* Check to see if we found a smaller solution than our median */
00113             if(cur_result.max_cost < median_val)
00114             {
00115                 arrow_debug(" - Found a smaller solution than our median: %d\n",
00116                             cur_result.max_cost);
00117                 arrow_util_binary_search(info->cost_list, 
00118                                          info->cost_list_length,
00119                                          cur_result.max_cost, &high);
00120                                          
00121                 if(low > high)
00122                 {
00123                     arrow_debug(" - Median smaller than low value, so set low = high\n");
00124                     low = high;
00125                 }
00126             }
00127             else
00128             {
00129                 high = median;
00130             }
00131             
00132             /* Copy over new best objective value and tour */
00133             result->min_cost = cur_result.min_cost;
00134             result->max_cost = cur_result.max_cost;
00135             result->tour_length = cur_result.tour_length;
00136             if(result->tour != NULL)
00137             {
00138                 result->found_tour = ARROW_TRUE;
00139                 for(i = 0; i < problem->size; i++)
00140                     result->tour[i] = cur_result.tour[i];
00141             }   
00142         }
00143         else
00144         {
00145             arrow_debug("A tour could not be found.\n");
00146             low = median + 1;
00147             
00148             /* Check to see if we found a smaller solution than our median */
00149             if(cur_result.max_cost < median_val)
00150             {
00151                 arrow_debug(" - Found a smaller solution than our best: %d\n",
00152                             cur_result.max_cost);
00153                 arrow_debug(" - Lower upper bound to this value\n");
00154                 arrow_util_binary_search(info->cost_list, 
00155                                          info->cost_list_length,
00156                                          cur_result.max_cost, &high);
00157                                          
00158                 /* Copy over new best objective value and tour */
00159                 result->max_cost = cur_result.max_cost;
00160                 if(result->tour != NULL)
00161                 {
00162                     result->found_tour = ARROW_TRUE;
00163                     for(i = 0; i < problem->size; i++)
00164                         result->tour[i] = cur_result.tour[i];
00165                 }
00166             }
00167             
00168             if(low > high) low = high;
00169         }
00170         arrow_debug("\n");
00171         
00172         /* Copy over other important information */
00173         result->bin_search_steps++;
00174         for(i = 0; i < ARROW_TSP_SOLVER_COUNT; i++)
00175         {
00176             result->solver_attempts[i] += cur_result.solver_attempts[i];
00177             result->solver_time[i] += cur_result.solver_time[i];
00178         }
00179     }
00180 
00181     /* Confirm the solution if required.  If we can find a Hamiltonian cycle
00182        using costs strictly less than our objective value, then our tour
00183        is not optimal. */
00184 CONFIRM:
00185     if(params->confirm_sol)
00186     {
00187         arrow_debug("Confirming solution...\n");
00188         arrow_btsp_solve_plan confirm_plan_steps[1] = 
00189         {
00190            params->confirm_plan
00191         };
00192         
00193         printf("checking feasibility...\n");
00194         ret = arrow_btsp_feasible(problem, 1, confirm_plan_steps, INT_MIN, 
00195                                   result->max_cost - 1, &is_feasible, &cur_result);
00196         if(ret != ARROW_SUCCESS)
00197         {
00198             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00199             goto CLEANUP;
00200         }
00201         
00202         if(is_feasible)
00203         {
00204             arrow_debug("Tour found -- solution not optimal.\n");
00205             result->found_tour = ARROW_TRUE;
00206             
00207             /* Copy over new best objective value and tour */
00208             result->max_cost = cur_result.max_cost;
00209             result->tour_length = cur_result.tour_length;
00210             
00211             if(result->tour != NULL)
00212             {
00213                 result->found_tour = ARROW_TRUE;
00214                 for(i = 0; i < problem->size; i++)
00215                     result->tour[i] = cur_result.tour[i];
00216             }
00217         }
00218         else
00219         {
00220             arrow_debug("Tour could not be found -- solution optimal!\n");
00221             result->optimal = ARROW_TRUE;
00222         }
00223         
00224         result->solver_attempts[ARROW_TSP_CC_EXACT] 
00225             += cur_result.solver_attempts[ARROW_TSP_CC_EXACT];
00226         result->solver_time[ARROW_TSP_CC_EXACT] 
00227             += cur_result.solver_time[ARROW_TSP_CC_EXACT];
00228     }
00229 
00230                            
00231 CLEANUP:
00232     /* See if we've reached the lower bound to guarantee optimality */
00233     if(result->max_cost == params->lower_bound)
00234         result->optimal = ARROW_TRUE;
00235     result->total_time = arrow_util_zeit() - start_time;
00236 
00237     arrow_btsp_result_destruct(&cur_result);
00238     return ret;
00239 }
